name: Detective Noire
description:
Detective Noire needs your help! And that has something to do with pumpkin spice.... 

This game was created for the Great Harvest Game Jam 2020, the theme of which was Autumn. 

I wanted to use this jam to make my first 2D game and learn a little about 2D animation and how that works within games. This is my third jam and my first time as a solo dev. 

I used Unity, Procreate for assets, and Bosca Coeli

Third Party Assets: Font 'minecraft' Craftron Gaming found  at  https://www.dafont.com/minecraft.font
